channel.title: How come most npcs on my server open up banks?
channel.description:
Okay alot of my npcs open up a bank if you talk to them. Why?
Its weird cause if i put them in one place like varrock they open up a shop or do nothing lke they are supposed to do. but if I put them somewere else they just open up banks! its so mest up i hate it. can some one tell me why they are doing that.
and i also need help adding duel arena, pest control, and c wars.

item.title: How come most npcs on my server open up banks?
item.dc:creator: @Lil_Brudder Lil Brudder (-_-)
item.description:
@Lil_Brudder wrote:

no the npcs that open banks have no action at all. One of them Mage of Zamorak…he supposed to tele you to a place to do runecrafting. But i moved him to another location and now he just opens up a bank. and alot of other npcs open up banks to…it really bugs me

Read full topic
